title.native: 外れスキル《木の実マスター》~スキルの実(食べたら死ぬ)を無限に食べられるようになった件について~
title.romaji: Hazure Skill "Kinomi Master": Skill no Mi (Tabetara Shinu) wo Mugen ni Taberareru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite
title.english: Bogus Skill <<Fruitmaster>> ~About that time I became able to eat unlimited numbers of Skill Fruits (that kill you)~

description:
In a world where eating “Skill Fruits” grants special powers, Light, a boy who seeks to become the world’s greatest adventurer, obtains the <> skill, a bogus skill specializing in fruit cultivation that is completely useless in combat.

Eating a second “Skill Fruit” results in death, so there are no do-overs. Meanwhile, his childhood friend Rena, who promised to become an adventurer with him, achieves S Rank in record time, and the gap between them widens.

Light spends his days farming and training with a sword, but one day, he accidentally eats a second “Skill Fruit.”

“Why am I not dying?!”

Light avoids certain death and learns the incredible true power of the <> skill: he can eat as many “Skill Fruits” as he wants! His overpowered ability allows him to gain an ability every time he eats one, for an unlimited number of times!! The worst skill ever is actually the best skill ever!!!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed 1 week early on ABEMA and Crunchyroll. The original TV broadcast started on January 7, 2025.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

name.native: ライト・アンダーウッド

node.description:
**Height:** 158 cm
**Fanbase name:** Yuki-min
**Illustrator:** [Rin☆Yuu](https://anilist.co/staff/145614/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/yukihana-lamy/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFKOVgVbGmX65RxO3EtH3iw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yukihanalamy)

A snow elf from a noble family renowned in the remote Land of Silver. She decided to leave her home, along with her companion Daifuku, after her heart was touched by the fun and colorful streams from hololive. Her serious personality belies her naive, sheltered nature.

Yukihana Lamy is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the fifth generation wave of Hololive.

name.native: アーリオ・オーリオ・エ・ペペロンチーノ

node.description:

A seiyuu girl group belonging to Music Ray'n agency under Sony Music Japan. They also host A&G+ Radio "TriAngle Harmony" together.
